reason: UNDEFINED NORM: The statement uses ||·||_M but this norm has not been defined anywhere in the proof tree. Node 1.3.1.1 claims 'By definition 4.1, ||a||_M = sup_{ψ ∈ S_M} |ψ(a)|' but no definition 4.1 exists in scope. The norm ||·||_M must be explicitly defined BEFORE it can be used in a corollary statement.
